actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend section 312 of the Housing Act of 1964 for the purpose of authorizing $245,000,000 to be appropriated under such section for rehabilitation loans for fiscal year 1980.

summary.text: Amends the Housing Act of 1964 to authorize appropriations for rehabilitation loans not to exceed $245,000,000 for fiscal year 1980.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 312 of the Housing Act of 1964 for the purpose of authorizing $245,000,000 to be appropriated under such section for rehabilitation loans for fiscal year 1980.
